meanings.sent1: After the general left, the soldiers resaluted him as a sign of respect.
meanings.sent2: The soldier resalutes every time he sees an officer.
meanings.sent3: The cat resalutes its owner by rubbing against their legs when they come home.
meanings.sent4: The sun resalutes the earth each morning with its warm rays.
meanings.sent5: The student resalutes the teacher with a smile every morning.

meanings.sent1: When the old friends met again, they resaluted each other with a hug.
meanings.sent2: The host resalutes the guests as they arrive at the party.
meanings.sent3: The dog resalutes its favorite toy every time it finds it under the couch.
meanings.sent4: The flowers resalute the sun by blooming brightly in its presence.
meanings.sent5: The child resalutes their reflection in the mirror with a wave.
